meanings.sent1: She overtoiled to finish her project before the deadline.
meanings.sent2: He always overtoiled when it came to helping others.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel overtoiled to gather all the nuts before winter.
meanings.sent4: The ants overtoiled, carrying food many times their weight.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner overtoiled, pushing through the last mile.

meanings.sent1: The overtoiled worker fell asleep as soon as he got home.
meanings.sent2: The overtoiled farmer could barely lift his heavy tools.
meanings.sent3: The overtoiled puppy flopped down for a nap after playing all day.
meanings.sent4: The overtoiled engine sputtered and stopped after running for hours.
meanings.sent5: The overtoiled student struggled to keep their eyes open during class.
